FuncDef:
The vpn-instance command specifies on the BAS interface the VPN instance to which static users belong.
The undo vpn-instance command restores the default value.
By default, a public network VPN instance is bound to a static user.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN instance name. The instance must be a configured VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The vpn-instance command is used to specify on the BAS interface the VPN instance to which static users belong.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
